TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Flowchart extends System.Activities.NativeActivity

Docs.summary: Represents the models workflows using the familiar flowchart paradigm.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The Flowchart activity allows free-form creation of a workflow using nodes and links.
## Examples The following code sample demonstrates creating a Flowchart activity. This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](../Topic/Fault%20Handling%20in%20a%20Flowchart%20Activity%20Using%20TryCatch.md) sample.
[!code-cs[wfs_FlowChartWithFaultHandling#2](../../add/codesnippet/CSharp/flowchartwithfaulthandling/program.cs#2)]

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode"> to be executed when the flowchart starts.

remarks.format:
## Remarks There must only be one StartNode.
## Examples The following code sample demonstrates configuring the StartNode of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart> activity. This example is from the [Fault Handling in a Flowchart Activity Using TryCatch](../Topic/Fault%20Handling%20in%20a%20Flowchart%20Activity%20Using%20TryCatch.md) sample.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether unconnected nodes are validated.
Docs.value: `true` if unconnected nodes are validated; otherwise, `false`.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the collection of <xref:System.WorkflowModel.Variable> objects associated with the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Flowchart>, which are available to share state across the child activities contained within the Flowchart.

remarks.format:
